Our Mission

Chihuahua Rescue Transport (CRT) is a non-profit organization dedicated to saving chihuahuas by placing them in foster homes and supporting them until they are ready to be matched with their forever homes.

Chihuahuas most in need

A little puppy with a big need.

Peanut needs your help more than ever.

Buster is a little guy with a big heart.

PB and Sandra

Our Impact

10000+ animals saved

The “smell” center of a dog’s brain is 40 times larger than yours

2000+ Heartworm treatments

A study at UCSD claims that your dog can genuinely get jealous when they see you display affection for another creature

Hundreds of Volunteers

Stray dogs in Russia have learned how to ride the complex subway system, and get off at specific stops in search of food.

Countless Forever Homes

Dogs have wet noses because it helps to absorb scent chemicals.
